definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: dub.;—pl. abs. [[דַּחֲוׇן]] Da 6:19, Vrss conject.; AV RV instr. of music (so AE, assuming meaning str1 Ke [strings] for [[דְּחָא]] [BH [[דָּחָה]]] thrust; Saad RVm dancing-girls; Bertholdt al. concubines (fr. sens. obsc. of Ar. dah.ay, but then read prob. [[לְחֵנׇן]] (Da 5:2, Da 5:3, Da 5:23) Marti Prince Dr.
